title:
Relaxation for a degenerate functional with linear growth in the
  onedimensional case
authors: Valeria Chiad\`o Piat, Virginia De Cicco, Anderson Melchor Hernandez
abstract:
In this work, we study the relaxation of a degenerate functional with linear
growth, depending on a weight $w$ that does not exhibit doubling or
Muckenhoupt-type conditions. In order to obtain an explicit representation of
the relaxed functional and its domain, our main tools for are Sobolev
inequalities with double weight.
